scriptLines: selectRequiredColumns2 split(indicator == 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k' || indicator == 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),

sqlReaderQuery.value:
UPDATE [covid_progect_logs].[adf_logs] SET status = 'Succeed' WHERE job_id = '@{formatDateTime(variables('date'), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss')}';
SELECT * FROM [covid_progect_logs].[adf_logs];

UPDATE [covid_progect_logs].[adf_logs] SET status = 'Failed' WHERE job_id = '@{formatDateTime(variables('date'), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss')}';
SELECT * FROM [covid_progect_logs].[adf_logs];

INSERT INTO covid_progect_logs.adf_logs (job_id, job_name, status, trigger_date) values ('@{formatDateTime(variables('date'), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss')}', 'pl_ingest_population_data', 'Processing', '@{formatDateTime(variables('date'), 'yyyyMMdd')}');
SELECT * FROM covid_progect_logs.adf_logs;
